website_summaries.verdict: Once you figure out the perfect size for you, chances are you will find many fun occasions to wear these pretty sandals that are just right for summertime.
pros: A strappy, feminine sandal that works well for numerous warm-weather fashions including dressy wear
Has a padded foot bed that provides comfort for long walks and extended time on your feet
cons: Sizing is tricky, as consumers have reported them to slightly too small, too wide, and true to size
Short break in period may be required for some

customer_reviews.title: 20% restocking fee
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute, but the top band is too wide for my feet. I bought them in 2 different colors and tried 2 different sizes. None worked. Warning: The third party seller (Nord Boards) takes a 20% restocking fee off your return items. No where on the seller site or Amazon site does it mention this. I found out when I printed out the return label. You also have to pay return shipping. Had I known this, I would not have purchased from them.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty cute, but it would be great if Toms ...
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cute, but it would be great if Toms could be consistent with sizes. I typically wear an 8 in regular shoes, a 7.5 in the Toms classic canvas (as they stretch so much, which is fair), and an 8 in the other Toms I've owned (Desert Wedge, etc). So I had my boyfriend order an 8 in these cute sandals. They're definitely too small. I just wore them around the house to test them out, but already the straps were rubbing me on the ankle, and my toes were pretty much hitting the front edge. They're going back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Sizing is as expected. After about 2 days the super soft sole forms a slight impression of your foot for an extra comfy fit. Fantastic quality! Quick shipping. Much faster than the Toms site. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie T

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandal. The silver color and the beige banding around the toe area are a really cute combo and very versatile. Fits great and feels a little more substantial for walking than just a thong type sandal. The area between the toes could be a little softer but after breaking them in I'm sure they will be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: StillShopping

customer_reviews.title: Crooked straps
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so incredibly cute! But, I can only give them 2 stars because of the quality. The braided strap on one of the shoes was so wide it wasn’t even close to touching my foot. The other shoe was normal. Still gave 2 stars because they are cute. Maybe I received a defective pair. I’ll look for them in stores instead of online.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and stylish and so far holding up very well. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Emily Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SHOES, get you're regular size! I'm a 7.5 in some shoes and 7 in others (particularly shoes that run small) I got a 7.5 and they fit PERFECTLY. They are super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Fit small, go a size up if your a half size. My feet feel like little sausages. I ordered a 6.5, I’m a small person so they should’ve fit perfect. Super cute and comfy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Justin g.

customer_reviews.title: Large strap is a bit awkwardly placed
customer_reviews.text: Love Toms shoes they are always so comfortable, this pair is no exception. The only flaw is the large strap is a bit awkwardly placed and took a little to get used to after a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: stacy Parcell

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Just like my other Tom sandals. They seem true to size. I am wearing them today. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: I luv luv toms but unfortunately I returned them because ...
customer_reviews.text: I luv luv toms but unfortunately I returned them because they for some reason just didn’t fit right. I broke my baby toe and I think that is most of the problem. So will wait and see
customer_reviews.author: Debby Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Really like these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Really like these sandals. They fit nicely and are very comfortable. The beige strap is more of a canvas texture than leather.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable right out of the box and don't require any ...
customer_reviews.text: SO cute, and fits perfectly (true to size). They are comfortable right out of the box and don't require any wear-in time.
customer_reviews.author: LBROD

customer_reviews.title: It looks a little funny but I will try them out
customer_reviews.text: The right shoes woven band that goes across the foot was larger than the left shoes. I measured it to be 2/8" longer. It looks a little funny but I will try them out. They no longer have my size available either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, cushiony and stylish! I’m picky with sandals but these fit well.
customer_reviews.author: L G

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: True to size, cute & comfortable. I got the blk & white & they go with my entire summer wardrobe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: much cheaper than buying item directly from Toms. seems to run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these and wear them everywhere! Super comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Tom's sandals are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, super comfortable from the first try. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: A. Peelman

customer_reviews.title: that these sandals are you all time favorite pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, that these sandals are you all time favorite pair of shoes! I plan to buying a second pair in another color soon!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: And get lots of compliments ton them too! Bought them in a second pattern, too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sole and in between toes started peeling after 5th wear.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Little

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal..
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal - haven't had the chance to wear them much but they seem comfortable. Hope they don't stretch too much.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: But on a good note they are super soft to walk in
customer_reviews.text: Cute but the straps stretch out and they become a bit uncomfortable to walk in. But on a good note they are super soft to walk in. I walked disney world in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are really comfortable and look cute. I love these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: I love Tom's but these were a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I love Tom's but these were a disappointment. They do not stretch whatsoever and the bottoms are too flat to be comfortable for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I love Toms and these are super cute. They are roomy, but don't run long like the traditional Toms.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, soft comfortable sole
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, soft comfortable sole, cute straps - I love these. My only problem now is finding outfits that work with them (I feel wrong wearing patterned shoes with other-patterned outfits. But I'm weird that way)! I had not read the description closely and was surprised to find that the wider strap is made of leather (or synthetic) rather than fabric on the black & white shoe. But it's still comfortable and very cute. Size for me was true. With the original canvas TOMS I size down to account for the stretch. But these don't stretch, so I'm wearing my usual size. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on these and people asking where I got them. They're comfortable and so pretty!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bennett

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Made surprisingly well. These are blue Jean material which I didn't expect, but look great and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I adore these sandals, and get SO many complements on them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, cute, classic!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable cute and classic! Bought 3 in 3 diff colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddix

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for summer them and I get so mang compliments on them! They are really comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute and comfortable, but the straps are almost too soft of a leather and they stretch out when worn around. Not really worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor L.

customer_reviews.title: I'm obessed with these sandals! Put them onand wore ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm obessed with these sandals! Put them onand wore them for two days straight. No pain or soreness. A really well made, supportive sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Lesleigh Raye

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are awesome! Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are awesome! Super comfy, fit perfectly! I am ordering more in a different color! I have warn them to work and to the beach! I have flat, wide feet, they fit great! I love love them❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a SURPRISINGLY comfortable sandal! Way to go
customer_reviews.text: This is a SURPRISINGLY comfortable sandal! Way to go, Toms! I wasn't expecting it to be this comfy. I've worn them all day, lots of walking, without my feet hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Brown123

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes but I gave them to my Mother in ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but I gave them to my Mother in Law because the sandals were way too wide for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Deena P

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Walked miles new & no blisters!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Women's Correa Flat Sandal and they fell apart after about a year. These seem a lot more sturdy. Also, the material of the straps feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alexus Dueitt

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: They are so comfy and fit very well! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: kaite oneil

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! I will live in these this summer
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I will live in these this summer! Nice enough to wear with a dress and casual enough to wear with shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Alea Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not much arch support but very comfortable sandals! I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: jewelry girl

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for style and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the look, feel and all-around style of this shoe. Everything is as described and she loves wearing them and supporting Toms mission.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. Toms does run a bit big. I always go a 1/2 down and it works with all of mine. I adore these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tom's Sandal
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable! I have trouble with my foot sliding around inside sandals. The leather keeps my foot in place without feeling sticky or stuck there (or without making my feet stink). I've gotten so many compliments, and everyone has been surprised when I tell them these are Toms. I just bought a second pair in the nude/gold. Great sandal!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bexar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products
customer_reviews.text: already had a pair and loved it, so I had to buy a second pair! Perfect fit, extreme comfort, ideal sandal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! They are so comfortable and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: and they were great! The colors are fun and they are easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for a baby shower, and they were great! The colors are fun and they are easy to match with clothes. As a teacher, I'm on my feet most of the day, and I can wear these shoes to work WITHOUT having to bring comfy shoes to change in to.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but they leave a yellow/orange stain on the bottoms of my feet when I wear them for an entire day. It is awful to scrub off.
customer_reviews.author: e_Y

product_meta.title: TOMS Women's Lexie Sandal
product_meta.description: With every pair of shoes you purchase, TOMS® will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need. One for One®. TOMS® Lexie Sandal is inspired by the famous gladiator style, but with a sleek, feminine twist! Leather or textile upper. Material is stated in the color name. Please note: Pattern may vary depending on cut of material. Metal TOMS plaque on side. Ankle strap with adjustable metal buckle. Cushioned leather footbed provides light cushioning. Flexible, one-piece, mixed-rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 1⁄2 in Weight: 8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 8.5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Adjustable ankle strap with buckle closure
